column2: is a town and the capital of the Upper Denkyira East Municipal District
column3: a district in the Central Region of south Ghana. Dunkwa-On-Offin has a 2013 settlement population of 33

column1: Dunkwa-On-Offin town is located along the Offin River. Dunkwa-On-Offin is low-lying with loose quaternary sands and the town rises up to 117 metres above sea level. The town is drained by a number of rivers and streams
column2: including the Offin River and other small steams.
